title: S&P 500 Hits New All-Time High: Tech Stocks Drive 18% YTD Gains
shortdescription: Magnificent 7 leads rally as Fed cut expectations reach 95% probability.
description: Dow +2%, Nasdaq +3% on strong retail earnings – VIX drops to 12.5, lowest since 2023.
author: Henrry Willy

title: India Posts 8.2% GDP Growth – Officially World's Fastest Growing Major Economy
shortdescription: Surpasses China for third straight year – set to become #3 economy by 2027.
description: Services exports, manufacturing boom, and infrastructure spending drive growth — IMF upgrades India to 8% for 2025-26.
author: Macro Anton

title: PayPal's PYUSD Becomes #1 Stablecoin – Overtakes USDT in Daily Volume
shortdescription: PayPal's dollar stablecoin now used by 600 million users — Tether market share collapses.
description: Venmo integrates PYUSD payments — daily volume hits $18B, surpassing USDT for first time in history.
author: Gwen John

title: Plaid Files for $50 Billion IPO – The 'Pipe' of Banking Goes Public
shortdescription: Company that connects your bank to Venmo, CashApp, Robinhood finally IPOs.
description: Plaid powers 80% of U.S. fintech apps — valuation surpasses SoFi, Chime, and Robinhood combined.
author: Gwen John

title: U.S. National Debt Hits $36 Trillion – Interest Payments Now Larger Than Defense Budget
shortdescription: Interest on debt exceeds $1.2T annually – bigger than entire military spending.
description: CBO warns debt-to-GDP ratio will hit 130% by 2030 — Treasury yields spike as foreign buyers pull back.
author: Macro Anton

title: Saudi Vision 2030 Declared Success – Non-Oil Revenue Now 60% of GDP
shortdescription: Kingdom reduces oil dependence dramatically – tourism and tech sectors explode.
description: NEOM, Red Sea Project, and entertainment cities generate $80B annually — oil now only 40% of government revenue.
author: Macro Anton

title: Wise (TransferWise) Reports $10 Billion Profit – Bigger Than JPMorgan
shortdescription: UK fintech disrupts global remittances — now most profitable bank on earth.
description: Zero-fee international transfers + 5% interest accounts = Wise passes 25 million customers and $10B annual profit.
author: Gwen John

title: Oil Prices Crash 12% After OPEC+ Announces Surprise Production Increase
shortdescription: Brent crude falls to $68/barrel – energy stocks plunge 4% across the board.
description: Saudi Arabia leads 500K bpd hike despite Russia pushback – global recession fears intensify as US inventories swell.
author: Henrry Willy
